attributes.action: Implement a Register of False Accusers of Rape and Sexual Harassment Cases
attributes.additional_details:
See some cases below:

Hundreds of cases dropped over evidence disclosure failings
http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-42795058

Thirteen innocent men put through hell
https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/5390418/cps-reveals-13-more-innocent-men-were-put-through-rape-hell-after-key-evidence-was-withheld-as-oxford-student-is-latest-to-be-cleared/
attributes.background: With the wave of false rape and sexual harassment accusations and the negative impact this form of abuse has on innocent lives, is it only right and proper that innocent men, women and genuine victims should be protected from this kind of abuse of the law?

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition calling for a register of people who have been convicted of making false allegations of a crime, if that's what you would like to happen.
